job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Within the Data Office, we have a team responsible for building impactful AI solutions. With these AI solutions, we help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes. An example of this is the digitization of our Claims processes. Your main goal is to deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way., In the past year, we have set up various applications using LLMs and we are now looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to further scale these applications and help build new AI solutions. You provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions. With your solution-oriented and proactive mindset, you help the team scale and make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy. We work agile with colleagues from the business on projects that are often sprint-transcending.

   In concrete terms, you bring AI solutions to production so that your solutions really create value for our company of tomorrow. Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role. In addition, you actively contribute to innovation within NN. During our monthly innovation day, you investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer - Gen AI

Within the Data Office, we have a team responsible for building impactful AI solutions. With these AI solutions, we help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes. An example of this is the digitization of our Claims processes. Your main goal is to deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way., In the past year, we have set up various applications using LLMs and we are now looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to further scale these applications and help build new AI solutions. You provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions. With your solution-oriented and proactive mindset, you help the team scale and make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy. We work agile with colleagues from the business on projects that are often sprint-transcending.

   In concrete terms, you bring AI solutions to production so that your solutions really create value for our company of tomorrow. Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role. In addition, you actively contribute to innovation within NN. During our monthly innovation day, you investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes deploying and scaling AI solutions built with LLMs, building new AI solutions, providing vision for cloud architecture for AI solutions, and making AI solutions production-worthy. It also mentions exploring and applying new technology and contributing to innovation through monthly innovation days. These responsibilities align strongly with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems and working with LLMs.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'deploy/roll out the AI solutions... in a scalable and secure way' and 'make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy' directly relates to building and deploying software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'help build new AI solutions' implies the development of new software components or applications.
The phrase 'provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions' points to the operational aspects of deploying and managing AI systems in the cloud.
job_tasks.phrase: provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy' directly relates to the operational goal of getting AI solutions ready for production.
job_tasks.phrase: make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'bring AI solutions to production' is a direct statement about deploying and managing AI models in a live environment.
The mention of 'applications using LLMs' and 'new AI solutions' indicates work involving generative models.

While not explicitly stated as 'data engineering', the context of 'digitize important processes' and 'digitization of our Claims processes' implies the need to handle and process data to enable these digital transformations.
The phrase 'help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes' shows an understanding of business needs and how AI can address them.
job_tasks.phrase: help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'further scale these applications' directly relates to the operational task of scaling deployed AI solutions.
The phrase 'manage it for our AI solutions' implies ongoing operational responsibility for the deployed AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: manage it for our AI solutions

soft_skills.phrase: Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role
actively contribute to innovation within NN
investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company
agile with colleagues from the business
